tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback (feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
feedback_text TEXT,
customer_id INT,
feedback_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
customer_name VARCHAR(50),
customer_email VARCHAR(50),
feedback_threshold INT);
CREATE TABLE feedback (id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, rating INT, comment TEXT);
CREATE TABLE support_team_notification (id INT PRIMARY KEY, support_team_id INT, notification_type TEXT, message TEXT);
CREATE TABLE feedback_criteria (id INT PRIMARY KEY, criteria_name TEXT, threshold INT);
CREATE TABLE feedback_notification_trigger (id INT PRIMARY KEY, feedback_id INT, criteria_id INT, support_team_id INT, triggered_at TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE feedback (   feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL,   customer_id INT NOT NULL,   date_created TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE support_team (   team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   team_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE notification_criteria (   criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   criteria_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   threshold INT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE notification_log (   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   notification_text TEXT NOT NULL,   recipient_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   date_sent TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE feedback_trigger (   trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   feedback_id INT NOT NULL,   criteria_id INT NOT NULL,   team_id INT NOT NULL );
